abilities.name: Deathbringer Stance
abilities.description: Aatrox deals bonus damage on his next attack, healing for the damage dealt.

abilities.name: The Darkin Blade
abilities.description: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

abilities.name: Infernal Chains
abilities.description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

abilities.name: Umbral Dash
abilities.description: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.

abilities.name: World Ender
abilities.description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and movement speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended, and he revives upon taking lethal damage.

abilities.name: Vastayan Grace
abilities.description: Whenever Ahri's spells hit a champion 2 times within a short period, she briefly gains movement speed.

abilities.name: Orb of Deception
abilities.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. After earning several spell hits, Ahri's next orb hits will restore her health.

abilities.name: Fox-Fire
abilities.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her and take more damage from her abilities.

abilities.name: Spirit Rush
abilities.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.

abilities.name: Assassin's Mark
abilities.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

abilities.name: Five Point Strike
abilities.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.

abilities.name: Twilight Shroud
abilities.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

abilities.name: Shuriken Flip
abilities.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing physical damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Perfect Execution
abilities.description: Akali leaps in a direction, stunning and damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.

abilities.name: Triumphant Roar
abilities.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

abilities.name: Cursed Touch
abilities.description: Amumu's basic attacks Curse enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.

abilities.name: Bandage Toss
abilities.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

abilities.name: Despair
abilities.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.

abilities.name: Tantrum
abilities.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
abilities.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.

abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.description: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

abilities.name: Flash Frost
abilities.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

abilities.name: Crystallize
abilities.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.

abilities.name: Glacial Storm
abilities.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.

abilities.name: Pyromania
abilities.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Molten Shield
abilities.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.

abilities.name: Summon: Tibbers
abilities.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

abilities.name: Frost Shot
abilities.description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

abilities.name: Ranger's Focus
abilities.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

abilities.name: Volley
abilities.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.

abilities.name: Hawkshot
abilities.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

abilities.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
abilities.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.

abilities.name: Center of the Universe
abilities.description: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.

abilities.name: Starsurge
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.

abilities.name: Celestial Expansion
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.

abilities.name: Comet of Legend
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.

abilities.name: Voice of Light
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.

abilities.name: Shurima's Legacy
abilities.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

abilities.name: Conquering Sands
abilities.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.

abilities.name: Arise!
abilities.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.

abilities.name: Shifting Sands
abilities.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.

abilities.name: Emperor's Divide
abilities.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Traveler's Call
abilities.description: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.

abilities.name: Cosmic Binding
abilities.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.

abilities.name: Caretaker's Shrine
abilities.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.

abilities.name: Magical Journey
abilities.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.

abilities.name: Tempered Fate
abilities.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 30% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.

abilities.name: Rocket Grab
abilities.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

abilities.name: Power Fist
abilities.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.description: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 3 seconds. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Sear
abilities.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Pillar of Flame
abilities.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Pyroclasm
abilities.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

abilities.name: Concussive Blows
abilities.description: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.

abilities.name: Winter's Bite
abilities.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

abilities.name: Stand Behind Me
abilities.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.

abilities.name: Glacial Fissure
abilities.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

abilities.name: Piltover Peacemaker
abilities.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

abilities.name: Yordle Snap Trap
abilities.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: 90 Caliber Net
abilities.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

abilities.name: Ace in the Hole
abilities.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

abilities.name: Adaptive Defenses
abilities.description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Precision Protocol
abilities.description: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

abilities.name: Tactical Sweep
abilities.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.

abilities.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
abilities.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

abilities.name: Serpentine Grace
abilities.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

abilities.name: Noxious Blast
abilities.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

abilities.name: Twin Fang
abilities.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

abilities.name: Carnivore
abilities.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Feral Scream
abilities.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Vorpal Spikes
abilities.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

abilities.name: Hextech Munitions
abilities.description: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

abilities.name: Phosphorus Bomb
abilities.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

abilities.name: Gatling Gun
abilities.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.

abilities.name: Missile Barrage
abilities.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.

abilities.name: Hemorrhage
abilities.description: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

abilities.name: Decimate
abilities.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.

abilities.name: Crippling Strike
abilities.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.

abilities.name: Apprehend
abilities.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

abilities.name: Noxian Guillotine
abilities.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Moonsilver Blade
abilities.description: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

abilities.name: Crescent Strike
abilities.description:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Pale Cascade
abilities.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

abilities.name: Moonfall
abilities.description:
Passive: Increases the attack speed gained from Moonsilver Blade

Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Lunar Rush
abilities.description:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

abilities.name: Infected Cleaver
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned a portion of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (doubled on killing blows).

abilities.name: Burning Agony
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Masochism
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.

abilities.name: Sadism
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.

abilities.name: Spinning Axe
abilities.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

abilities.name: Blood Rush
abilities.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

abilities.name: Stand Aside
abilities.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.

abilities.name: Z-Drive Resonance
abilities.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

abilities.name: Timewinder
abilities.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.

abilities.name: Parallel Convergence
abilities.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.

abilities.name: Phase Dive
abilities.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

abilities.name: Chronobreak
abilities.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

abilities.name: Spider Queen
abilities.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

abilities.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
abilities.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

abilities.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
abilities.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Cocoon / Rappel
abilities.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.

abilities.name: Spider Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

abilities.name: Demon Shade
abilities.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

abilities.name: Hate Spike
abilities.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

abilities.name: Allure
abilities.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

abilities.name: Whiplash
abilities.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: Last Caress
abilities.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

abilities.name: Rising Spell Force
abilities.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Mystic Shot
abilities.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Shift
abilities.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

abilities.name: Trueshot Barrage
abilities.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).

abilities.name: Dread
abilities.description:
Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer.

Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.

abilities.name: Terrify
abilities.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.

abilities.name: Drain
abilities.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.

abilities.name: Dark Wind
abilities.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.

abilities.name: Crowstorm
abilities.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

abilities.name: Duelist's Dance
abilities.description: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

abilities.name: Lunge
abilities.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

abilities.name: Riposte
abilities.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

abilities.name: Bladework
abilities.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.

abilities.name: Grand Challenge
abilities.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.

abilities.name: Nimble Fighter
abilities.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.

abilities.name: Urchin Strike
abilities.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

abilities.name: Seastone Trident
abilities.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.

abilities.name: Playful / Trickster
abilities.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

abilities.name: Chum the Waters
abilities.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.

abilities.name: Colossal Smash
abilities.description: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.

abilities.name: Winds of War
abilities.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.

abilities.name: Shield of Durand
abilities.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Justice Punch
abilities.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.

abilities.name: Hero's Entrance
abilities.description: Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Trial by Fire
abilities.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

abilities.name: Parrrley
abilities.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

abilities.name: Remove Scurvy
abilities.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

abilities.name: Powder Keg
abilities.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

abilities.name: Cannon Barrage
abilities.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Perseverance
abilities.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.

abilities.name: Decisive Strike
abilities.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

abilities.name: Courage
abilities.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.

abilities.name: Demacian Justice
abilities.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.

abilities.name: Rage Gene
abilities.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

abilities.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
abilities.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

abilities.name: Hyper / Wallop
abilities.description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Hop / Crunch
abilities.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

abilities.name: GNAR!
abilities.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

abilities.name: Happy Hour
abilities.description: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Barrel Roll
abilities.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.

abilities.name: Drunken Rage
abilities.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

abilities.name: Body Slam
abilities.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

abilities.name: Explosive Cask
abilities.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

abilities.name: New Destiny
abilities.description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.

abilities.name: End of the Line
abilities.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced briefly.

abilities.name: Quickdraw
abilities.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

abilities.name: Collateral Damage
abilities.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.

abilities.name: Spirit of Dread
abilities.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.

abilities.name: Devastating Charge
abilities.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

abilities.name: Onslaught of Shadows
abilities.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

abilities.name: Hextech Affinity
abilities.description: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

abilities.name: H-28 G Evolution Turret
abilities.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).

abilities.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
abilities.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.

abilities.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
abilities.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

abilities.name: Prophet of an Elder God
abilities.description: Illaoi and the Vessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

abilities.name: Tentacle Smash
abilities.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

abilities.name: Harsh Lesson
abilities.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

abilities.name: Test of Spirit
abilities.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.

abilities.name: Leap of Faith
abilities.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.

abilities.name: Ionian Fervor
abilities.description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

abilities.name: Bladesurge
abilities.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

abilities.name: Defiant Dance
abilities.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

abilities.name: Flawless Duet
abilities.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.

abilities.name: Vanguard's Edge
abilities.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.

abilities.name: Friend of the Forest
abilities.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

abilities.name: Rootcaller
abilities.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

abilities.name: Brushmaker
abilities.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

abilities.name: Triggerseed
abilities.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Daisy!
abilities.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description:
Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.

Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Howling Gale
abilities.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Zephyr
abilities.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.

abilities.name: Eye Of The Storm
abilities.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Monsoon
abilities.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.

abilities.name: Martial Cadence
abilities.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.

abilities.name: Dragon Strike
abilities.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Golden Aegis
abilities.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Demacian Standard
abilities.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Cataclysm
abilities.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.

abilities.name: Relentless Assault
abilities.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Leap Strike
abilities.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.

abilities.name: Counter Strike
abilities.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Grandmaster's Might
abilities.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.

abilities.name: Hextech Capacitor
abilities.description: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
abilities.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
abilities.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.

abilities.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
abilities.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.

abilities.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
abilities.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

abilities.name: Whisper
abilities.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

abilities.name: Dancing Grenade
abilities.description: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.

abilities.name: Deadly Flourish
abilities.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted.

abilities.name: Captive Audience
abilities.description:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.

abilities.name: Curtain Call
abilities.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

abilities.name: Get Excited!
abilities.description: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Switcheroo!
abilities.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.

abilities.name: Zap!
abilities.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

abilities.name: Flame Chompers!
abilities.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

abilities.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
abilities.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

abilities.name: Second Skin
abilities.description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

abilities.name: Icathian Rain
abilities.description:
Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.

Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.

abilities.name: Void Seeker
abilities.description:
Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.

abilities.name: Supercharge
abilities.description:
Kai'Sa briefly increases her movement speed, then increases her attack speed.

Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.

abilities.name: Killer Instinct
abilities.description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Martial Poise
abilities.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description:
Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

abilities.name: Rend
abilities.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

abilities.name: Fate's Call
abilities.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

abilities.name: Gathering Fire
abilities.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

abilities.name: Inner Flame
abilities.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

abilities.name: Focused Resolve
abilities.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Mantra
abilities.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

abilities.name: Death Defied
abilities.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.

abilities.name: Lay Waste
abilities.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Wall of Pain
abilities.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

abilities.name: Defile
abilities.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

abilities.name: Requiem
abilities.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

abilities.name: Void Stone
abilities.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

abilities.name: Null Sphere
abilities.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

abilities.name: Nether Blade
abilities.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

abilities.name: Force Pulse
abilities.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

abilities.name: Riftwalk
abilities.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

abilities.name: Voracity
abilities.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Bouncing Blade
abilities.description: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

abilities.name: Preparation
abilities.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.

abilities.name: Shunpo
abilities.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

abilities.name: Death Lotus
abilities.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

abilities.name: Divine Ascent
abilities.description: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Movement Speed towards enemies, waves of fire on her attacks, Attack Range, and True Damage.

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

abilities.name: Celestial Blessing
abilities.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants movement speed to herself and the nearest ally.

abilities.name: Starfire Spellblade
abilities.description:
Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.

abilities.name: Divine Judgment
abilities.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

abilities.name: The Darkin Scythe
abilities.description:
Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin.

Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions.

Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Reaping Slash
abilities.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

abilities.name: Blade's Reach
abilities.description: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Kayn can walk through terrain.

abilities.name: Umbral Trespass
abilities.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

abilities.name: Mark of the Storm
abilities.description:
Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.

The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Thundering Shuriken
abilities.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

abilities.name: Electrical Surge
abilities.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

abilities.name: Lightning Rush
abilities.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains movement speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

abilities.name: Slicing Maelstrom
abilities.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

abilities.name: Unseen Threat
abilities.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

abilities.name: Taste Their Fear
abilities.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

abilities.name: Void Spike
abilities.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

abilities.name: Void Assault
abilities.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, Void Assault gains increased Invisibility duration, and an additional use.

abilities.name: Mark of the Kindred
abilities.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

abilities.name: Dance of Arrows
abilities.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

abilities.name: Wolf's Frenzy
abilities.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him. Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.

abilities.name: Mounting Dread
abilities.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

abilities.name: Lamb's Respite
abilities.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

abilities.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
abilities.description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

abilities.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
abilities.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

abilities.name: Violent Tendencies
abilities.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

abilities.name: Jousting
abilities.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

abilities.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
abilities.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

abilities.name: Icathian Surprise
abilities.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Caustic Spittle
abilities.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

abilities.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
abilities.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

abilities.name: Void Ooze
abilities.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

abilities.name: Living Artillery
abilities.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description:
When LeBlanc drops below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

Mirror Image has a 1 minute cooldown.

Mirror Image can be controlled by holding the Alt key and using the right mouse button.

abilities.name: Sigil of Malice
abilities.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Distortion
abilities.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

abilities.name: Ethereal Chains
abilities.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.

abilities.name: Mimic
abilities.description: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

abilities.name: Flurry
abilities.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
abilities.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

abilities.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
abilities.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

abilities.name: Tempest / Cripple
abilities.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

abilities.name: Dragon's Rage
abilities.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

abilities.name: Sunlight
abilities.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

abilities.name: Shield of Daybreak
abilities.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

abilities.name: Zenith Blade
abilities.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.

abilities.name: Iceborn Subjugation
abilities.description: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after 4 seconds, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

abilities.name: Glacial Path
abilities.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

abilities.name: Frozen Tomb
abilities.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Lightslinger
abilities.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

abilities.name: Piercing Light
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

abilities.name: Ardent Blaze
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

abilities.name: The Culling
abilities.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

abilities.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
abilities.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

abilities.name: Glitterlance
abilities.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

abilities.name: Whimsy
abilities.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.

abilities.name: Help, Pix!
abilities.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

abilities.name: Wild Growth
abilities.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

abilities.name: Light Binding
abilities.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

abilities.name: Prismatic Barrier
abilities.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

abilities.name: Lucent Singularity
abilities.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

abilities.name: Final Spark
abilities.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark helps take down a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

abilities.name: Granite Shield
abilities.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

abilities.name: Seismic Shard
abilities.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Brutal Strikes
abilities.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).

abilities.name: Ground Slam
abilities.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Force
abilities.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

abilities.name: Void Shift
abilities.description:
When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

Damage from lane minions is unaffected.

abilities.name: Call of the Void
abilities.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

abilities.name: Void Swarm
abilities.description: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Malefic Visions
abilities.description:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

abilities.name: Nether Grasp
abilities.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

abilities.name: Sap Magic
abilities.description: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

abilities.name: Bramble Smash
abilities.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Twisted Advance
abilities.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.

abilities.name: Sapling Toss
abilities.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.

abilities.name: Double Strike
abilities.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

abilities.name: Alpha Strike
abilities.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

abilities.name: Meditate
abilities.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

abilities.name: Wuju Style
abilities.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.

abilities.name: Highlander
abilities.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

abilities.name: Love Tap
abilities.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

abilities.name: Double Up
abilities.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

abilities.name: Strut
abilities.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

abilities.name: Make It Rain
abilities.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

abilities.name: Bullet Time
abilities.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

abilities.name: Obliterate
abilities.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

abilities.name: Indestructible
abilities.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.

abilities.name: Death's Grasp
abilities.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Realm of Death
abilities.description: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.

abilities.name: Soul Siphon
abilities.description: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and large monsters.

abilities.name: Dark Binding
abilities.description: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Tormented Shadow
abilities.description: Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are.

abilities.name: Black Shield
abilities.description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

abilities.name: Soul Shackles
abilities.description: Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining movement speed towards them. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.

abilities.name: Surging Tides
abilities.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: Aqua Prison
abilities.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

abilities.name: Ebb and Flow
abilities.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
abilities.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

abilities.name: Soul Eater
abilities.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

abilities.name: Siphoning Strike
abilities.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

abilities.name: Wither
