abilities.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.

abilities.name: Spirit Fire
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

abilities.name: Fury of the Sands
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.

abilities.name: Staggering Blow
abilities.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

abilities.name: Dredge Line
abilities.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.

abilities.name: Titan's Wrath
abilities.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Depth Charge
abilities.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

abilities.name: Inherent Glamour
abilities.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Champion combat or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

abilities.name: Blooming Burst
abilities.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

abilities.name: Shapesplitter
abilities.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.

abilities.name: Tangle-Barbs
abilities.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle hits an enemy, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

abilities.name: Pop Blossom
abilities.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

abilities.name: Prowl
abilities.description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

abilities.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies. As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

abilities.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.

abilities.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

abilities.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
abilities.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

abilities.name: Umbra Blades
abilities.description:
Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second (2 against champions).

abilities.name: Duskbringer
abilities.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Shroud of Darkness
abilities.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

abilities.name: Unspeakable Horror
abilities.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

abilities.name: Call of the Freljord
abilities.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

abilities.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
abilities.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it. The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.

abilities.name: Snowball Barrage
abilities.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies. When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

abilities.name: Absolute Zero
abilities.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

abilities.name: Berserker Rage
abilities.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.

abilities.name: Undertow
abilities.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Vicious Strikes
abilities.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.

abilities.name: Reckless Swing
abilities.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

abilities.name: Ragnarok
abilities.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.

abilities.name: Clockwork Windup
abilities.description: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.

abilities.name: Command: Attack
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

abilities.name: Command: Dissonance
abilities.description: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Command: Protect
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

abilities.name: Command: Shockwave
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.description:
Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13, he will upgrade any eligible items into masterwork items for himself, up to 2 max. For each level after 13, Ornn can upgrade an item for an ally by going near them and clicking on them, max 1 per ally.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

abilities.name: Volcanic Rupture
abilities.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

abilities.name: Bellows Breath
abilities.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

abilities.name: Searing Charge
abilities.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

abilities.name: Call of the Forge God
abilities.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

abilities.name: Aegis Protection
abilities.description: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.

abilities.name: Spear Shot
abilities.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.

abilities.name: Aegis of Zeonia
abilities.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.

abilities.name: Heartseeker Strike
abilities.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.

abilities.name: Grand Skyfall
abilities.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.

abilities.name: Iron Ambassador
abilities.description:
Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage.

The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

abilities.name: Hammer Shock
abilities.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

abilities.name: Steadfast Presence
abilities.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.

abilities.name: Heroic Charge
abilities.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

abilities.name: Keeper's Verdict
abilities.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

abilities.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
abilities.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

abilities.name: Bone Skewer
abilities.description: Pyke either stabs enemies in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

abilities.name: Ghostwater Dive
abilities.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.

abilities.name: Phantom Undertow
abilities.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemies along its path.

abilities.name: Death From Below
abilities.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.

abilities.name: Royal Privilege
abilities.description: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
abilities.description: Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.

abilities.name: Terrashape
abilities.description: Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted.

abilities.name: Audacity
abilities.description: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them.

abilities.name: Supreme Display of Talent
abilities.description: Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Harrier
abilities.description: Valor periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable. Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.

abilities.name: Blinding Assault
abilities.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.

abilities.name: Heightened Senses
abilities.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

abilities.name: Behind Enemy Lines
abilities.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed. Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.

abilities.name: Fey Feathers
abilities.description: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

abilities.name: Gleaming Quill
abilities.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

abilities.name: Grand Entrance
abilities.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

abilities.name: Battle Dance
abilities.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

abilities.name: The Quickness
abilities.description: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

abilities.name: Spiked Shell
abilities.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

abilities.name: Powerball
abilities.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

abilities.name: Defensive Ball Curl
abilities.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.

abilities.name: Frenzying Taunt
abilities.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

abilities.name: Tremors
abilities.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.

abilities.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
abilities.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

abilities.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
abilities.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.

abilities.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
abilities.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
abilities.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

abilities.name: Reign of Anger
abilities.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

abilities.name: Cull the Meek
abilities.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

abilities.name: Ruthless Predator
abilities.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Slice and Dice
abilities.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

abilities.name: Dominus
abilities.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

abilities.name: Unseen Predator
abilities.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Savagery
abilities.description:
Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Battle Roar
abilities.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

abilities.name: Bola Strike
abilities.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.

abilities.name: Thrill of the Hunt
abilities.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.

abilities.name: Runic Blade
abilities.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

abilities.name: Broken Wings
abilities.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ki Burst
abilities.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Valor
abilities.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

abilities.name: Blade of the Exile
abilities.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

abilities.name: Junkyard Titan
abilities.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Flamespitter
abilities.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

abilities.name: Scrap Shield
abilities.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

abilities.name: Electro Harpoon
abilities.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

abilities.name: The Equalizer
abilities.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Arcane Mastery
abilities.description: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description:
Passively, Ryze's other basic abilities reset the cooldown of Overload and charge a rune. When Ryze casts Overload with 2 runes charged, he gains a brief burst of Movement Speed.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the target has Flux on it, Overload deals extra damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux.

abilities.name: Rune Prison
abilities.description: Ryze traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.

abilities.name: Spell Flux
abilities.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs all nearby enemies. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.

abilities.name: Realm Warp
abilities.description:
Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.

On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

abilities.name: Fury of the North
abilities.description: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

abilities.name: Arctic Assault
abilities.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Winter's Wrath
abilities.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.

abilities.name: Permafrost
abilities.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

abilities.name: Glacial Prison
abilities.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.

abilities.name: Deceive
abilities.description:
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and reducing Deceive's cooldown

abilities.name: Jack In The Box
abilities.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Two-Shiv Poison
abilities.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.

abilities.name: Hallucinate
abilities.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ki Barrier
abilities.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

abilities.name: Twilight Assault
abilities.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

abilities.name: Spirit's Refuge
abilities.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

abilities.name: Shadow Dash
abilities.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Stand United
abilities.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

abilities.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
abilities.description: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Twin Bite
abilities.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.

abilities.name: Burnout
abilities.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

abilities.name: Flame Breath
abilities.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

abilities.name: Dragon's Descent
abilities.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

abilities.name: Noxious Slipstream
abilities.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

abilities.name: Poison Trail
abilities.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

abilities.name: Mega Adhesive
abilities.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

abilities.name: Insanity Potion
abilities.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

abilities.name: Glory in Death
abilities.description:
After being killed Sion will reanimate himself, but his Health rapidly decays while he is reanimated.

He can move and attack during this time. He gains @Lifesteal*100@% Lifesteal, attacks extremely fast and will deal an additional @PercentMaxHP*100@% of his target's maximum Health as physical damage on hit. Max @NonChampCap@ bonus damage against non-champions.

All of his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants him a burst of Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Decimating Smash
abilities.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

abilities.name: Soul Furnace
abilities.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.

abilities.name: Roar of the Slayer
abilities.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
abilities.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.

abilities.name: Fleet of Foot
abilities.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Boomerang Blade
abilities.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

abilities.name: Ricochet
abilities.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.

abilities.name: On The Hunt
abilities.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

abilities.name: Crystal Spires
abilities.description: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

abilities.name: Crystal Slash
abilities.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
abilities.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.

abilities.name: Fracture
abilities.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.

abilities.name: Power Chord
abilities.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

abilities.name: Hymn of Valor
abilities.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

abilities.name: Aria of Perseverance
abilities.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Song of Celerity
abilities.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.

abilities.name: Crescendo
abilities.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.

abilities.name: Salvation
abilities.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

abilities.name: Starcall
abilities.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health.

abilities.name: Astral Infusion
abilities.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

abilities.name: Equinox
abilities.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

abilities.name: Wish
abilities.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.

abilities.name: Ravenous Flock
abilities.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

abilities.name: Death's Hand
abilities.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through targets killed. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

abilities.name: Vision of Empire
abilities.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

abilities.name: Nevermove
abilities.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.

abilities.name: Demonic Ascension
abilities.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from the 3 closest enemy champions. After draining enough health, Swain can cast Demonflare to end his transformation and decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.

abilities.name: Petricite Burst
abilities.description: After casting a spell, Sylas's next basic attack whirls his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit.

abilities.name: Chain Lash
abilities.description:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage and increasing the slow.

abilities.name: Kingslayer
abilities.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

abilities.name: Abscond / Abduct
abilities.description: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits. If he hits an enemy champion or monster, he gains a shield.

abilities.name: Hijack
abilities.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.

abilities.name: Transcendent
abilities.description:
Spells gain extra effects at max rank.

Dark Sphere: Deals 15% more damage against champions.
Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%.
Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

abilities.name: Dark Sphere
abilities.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.

abilities.name: Scatter the Weak
abilities.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

abilities.name: Unleashed Power
abilities.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

abilities.name: An Acquired Taste
abilities.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Tongue Lash
abilities.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.

abilities.name: Abyssal Voyage
abilities.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.

abilities.name: Rock Surfing
abilities.description: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

abilities.name: Threaded Volley
abilities.description: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.

abilities.name: Seismic Shove
abilities.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.

abilities.name: Unraveled Earth
abilities.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.

abilities.name: Weaver's Wall
abilities.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

abilities.name: Blade's End
abilities.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

abilities.name: Noxian Diplomacy
abilities.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

abilities.name: Rake
abilities.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

abilities.name: Assassin's Path
abilities.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

abilities.name: Shadow Assault
abilities.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

abilities.name: Bravado
abilities.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

abilities.name: Starlight's Touch
abilities.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

abilities.name: Bastion
abilities.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

abilities.name: Dazzle
abilities.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Cosmic Radiance
abilities.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

abilities.name: Guerrilla Warfare
abilities.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Dart
abilities.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

abilities.name: Move Quick
abilities.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

abilities.name: Toxic Shot
abilities.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Trap
abilities.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

abilities.name: Damnation
abilities.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

abilities.name: Death Sentence
abilities.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

abilities.name: Dark Passage
abilities.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

abilities.name: Flay
abilities.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

abilities.name: The Box
abilities.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

abilities.name: Draw a Bead
abilities.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

abilities.name: Rapid Fire
abilities.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Rocket Jump
abilities.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

abilities.name: Explosive Charge
abilities.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

abilities.name: Buster Shot
abilities.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

abilities.name: King's Tribute
abilities.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

abilities.name: Chomp
abilities.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Domain
abilities.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

abilities.name: Pillar of Ice
abilities.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

abilities.name: Battle Fury
abilities.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

abilities.name: Mocking Shout
abilities.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.

abilities.name: Spinning Slash
abilities.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Undying Rage
abilities.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

abilities.name: Loaded Dice
abilities.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

abilities.name: Wild Cards
abilities.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

abilities.name: Pick A Card
abilities.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

abilities.name: Stacked Deck
abilities.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

abilities.name: Destiny
abilities.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Deadly Venom
abilities.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Venom Cask
abilities.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

abilities.name: Contaminate
abilities.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

abilities.name: Spray and Pray
abilities.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

abilities.name: Monkey's Agility
abilities.description: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

abilities.name: Tiger Stance
abilities.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Turtle Stance
abilities.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.

abilities.name: Bear Stance
abilities.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.

abilities.name: Phoenix Stance
abilities.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.

abilities.name: Echoing Flames
abilities.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

abilities.name: Corrosive Charge
abilities.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.description: Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

abilities.name: Disdain
abilities.description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

abilities.name: Fear Beyond Death
abilities.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

abilities.name: Living Vengeance
abilities.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

abilities.name: Piercing Arrow
abilities.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

abilities.name: Blighted Quiver
abilities.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

abilities.name: Hail of Arrows
abilities.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

abilities.name: Chain of Corruption
abilities.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

abilities.name: Night Hunter
abilities.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

abilities.name: Tumble
abilities.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Silver Bolts
abilities.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Final Hour
abilities.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter

abilities.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
abilities.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

abilities.name: Baleful Strike
abilities.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

abilities.name: Dark Matter
abilities.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

abilities.name: Event Horizon
abilities.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.

abilities.name: Primordial Burst
abilities.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

abilities.name: Organic Deconstruction
abilities.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

abilities.name: Plasma Fission
abilities.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

abilities.name: Void Rift
abilities.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

abilities.name: Tectonic Disruption
abilities.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

abilities.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
abilities.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

abilities.name: Blast Shield
abilities.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

abilities.name: Vault Breaker
abilities.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

abilities.name: Denting Blows
abilities.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Excessive Force
abilities.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

abilities.name: Assault and Battery
abilities.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

abilities.name: Glorious Evolution
abilities.description: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.

abilities.name: Siphon Power
abilities.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.

abilities.name: Gravity Field
abilities.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

abilities.name: Death Ray
abilities.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Chaos Storm
abilities.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.

abilities.name: Crimson Pact
abilities.description: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

abilities.name: Transfusion
abilities.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

abilities.name: Sanguine Pool
abilities.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

abilities.name: Tides of Blood
abilities.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

abilities.name: Hemoplague
abilities.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

abilities.name: Chosen of the Storm
abilities.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.

abilities.name: Majestic Roar
abilities.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages, slows, and slightly knocks back enemies. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt additional damage. Minions and monsters are feared as well.

abilities.name: Thunder Claws
abilities.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number of nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Eternal Hunger
abilities.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

abilities.name: Jaws of the Beast
abilities.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

abilities.name: Blood Hunt
abilities.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

abilities.name: Primal Howl
abilities.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

abilities.name: Infinite Duress
abilities.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Stone Skin
abilities.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

abilities.name: Crushing Blow
abilities.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.

abilities.name: Decoy
abilities.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.

abilities.name: Nimbus Strike
abilities.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.

abilities.name: Clean Cuts
abilities.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: Double Daggers
abilities.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: Deadly Plumage
abilities.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.

abilities.name: Bladecaller
abilities.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

abilities.name: Featherstorm
abilities.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: Mana Surge
abilities.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

abilities.name: Arcanopulse
abilities.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

abilities.name: Eye of Destruction
abilities.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

abilities.name: Shocking Orb
abilities.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

abilities.name: Rite of the Arcane
abilities.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

abilities.name: Determination
abilities.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

abilities.name: Three Talon Strike
abilities.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

abilities.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
abilities.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.

abilities.name: Audacious Charge
abilities.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.

abilities.name: Crescent Guard
abilities.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

abilities.name: Way of the Wanderer
abilities.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

abilities.name: Steel Tempest
abilities.description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.

abilities.name: Wind Wall
abilities.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Sweeping Blade
abilities.description:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage, up to a max amount.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

abilities.name: Last Breath
abilities.description:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.

abilities.name: Shepherd of Souls
abilities.description: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.

abilities.name: Last Rites
abilities.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.

abilities.name: Dark Procession
abilities.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

abilities.name: Mourning Mist
abilities.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.

abilities.name: Eulogy of the Isles
abilities.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

abilities.name: Bop 'n' Block
abilities.description: Periodically, when Yuumi attacks a champion, she restores mana and gains a shield that follows her, protecting her and the ally she's attached to.

abilities.name: Prowling Projectile
abilities.description:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damge to the first target hit. It deals bonus damage and slows if it takes at least 1 second to get to its target.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor.

abilities.name: You and Me!
abilities.description: Passively, Yuumi and her attached ally share some of each other's Adaptive Force. Actively, Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets.

abilities.name: Zoomies
abilities.description: Heals Yuumi and gives a Movement Speed boost. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.

abilities.name: Final Chapter
abilities.description: Yuumi channels seven waves of damage, rooting anyone hit by three or more. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling.

abilities.name: Cell Division
abilities.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

abilities.name: Stretching Strikes
abilities.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

abilities.name: Unstable Matter
abilities.description: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.

abilities.name: Elastic Slingshot
abilities.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

abilities.name: Let's Bounce!
abilities.description: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.

abilities.name: Contempt for the Weak
abilities.description: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds on the same target.

abilities.name: Razor Shuriken
abilities.description:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.

Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.

abilities.name: Living Shadow
abilities.description:
Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

abilities.name: Shadow Slash
abilities.description: Zed and his shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.description: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

abilities.name: Short Fuse
abilities.description: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

abilities.name: Bouncing Bomb
abilities.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

abilities.name: Satchel Charge
abilities.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.

abilities.name: Hexplosive Minefield
abilities.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
abilities.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.

abilities.name: Time in a Bottle
abilities.description:
Zilean stores time as Experience.

When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

abilities.name: Time Bomb
abilities.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Rewind
abilities.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

abilities.name: Time Warp
abilities.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Chronoshift
abilities.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

abilities.name: More Sparkles!
abilities.description: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Paddle Star!
abilities.description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

abilities.name: Spell Thief
abilities.description: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

abilities.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
abilities.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

abilities.name: Portal Jump
abilities.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

abilities.name: Garden of Thorns
abilities.description:
Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies.

Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: Deadly Spines
abilities.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

abilities.name: Rampant Growth
abilities.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.

abilities.name: Grasping Roots
abilities.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Stranglethorns
abilities.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
